name: Human Defense Force
background:
The Human Defense Force is the military force of the largest alliance of Human colonies and planets present in Sirius. Thanks to this alliance, the HDF is able to field large and diverse forces of infantry and vehicles suited to the situation at hand.

The scattered remnants of the fleet that arrived in Sirius faced many challenges to their survival in the sector. The surviving colonies began to trade and aid each other, eventually establishing the Great Human Alliance. Yet, as some members seek to exert their influence on others, many have begun to fear that humanity will repeat the mistakes they made on earth.
backgroundFull:
The rise of a messianic figure known to history as the Founder resulted in a devastating war that soon engulfed Earth and its colonies. As the war grew more devastating, many survivors began to seek a means to escape. A desperate group of refugees stole and commandeered the God Founder’s own flagship in order to escape the conflict, leading a fleet of like-minded survivors. They were pursued by the Founder’s forces until they were lost and scattered by the sudden appearance of a wormhole which brought them to Sirius.

The remaining refugee ships moved quickly to settle suitable worlds. Many of these colonies faced unexpected hardships, including discovering their world had already been claimed by one of the alien factions native to Sirius. Humanity quickly realized that they would have to band together in order to survive in this new galaxy. Many of the human settlements joined together in a defensive alliance to protect themselves and represent their interests to the other factions, known as the Great Human Alliance. These worlds set aside their differences and worked together to help ensure the safety of humanity’s new home in the Sirius Sector.

In order to protect member worlds, the Alliance created the Human Defense Force. Each member world contributes soldiers and equipment, but the force is commanded and maintained by the Alliance as a whole. The Alliance lacks much of the advanced technology of the Conduits and their followers, such as Battle Armour and gene-mods, and instead relies on using rapid deployment, heavy artillery, and sheer numbers in combat.

As the Alliance became established in the Sirius Sector both as a diplomatic and military force, humans were gradually accepted as just another species within Sirius. Human worlds grew prosperous and even branched outwards, claiming and settling new worlds.  However, rifts have begun to form in the Alliance now that the immediate threats of Sirius have subsided.

Disputes over resources, settlement, and expansion, have led to more prosperous planets demanding more influence, while smaller worlds continue to demand autonomy. A delicate balance between the numerous factions is maintained by those dedicated to ensuring the alliance’s survival, but some fear that separatism or even a civil war may loom on the horizon.

How will you defend humanity’s new home in the stars?

spells.name: Psy-Injected Courage
spells.effect: Pick one friendly unit within 12", which gets Hold the Line Boost once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Electric Tempest
spells.effect: Pick one enemy unit within 12", which takes 2 hit with AP(1) and Fracture. Roll as many dice as hits to see if "on rolls of 6" effects trigger.

parameters.name: spellHitRoll
parameters.value: Roll as many dice as hits to see if "on rolls of 6" effects trigger.

spellHitRoll.name: Roll as many dice as hits to see if "on rolls of 6" effects trigger.

spells.name: Calculated Foresight
spells.effect: Pick up to two enemy units within 18", which friendly units gets Relentless against once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (this._skirmish ? 1 : this.AuraSize), avgUnit: true }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Searing Burst
spells.effect: Pick one enemy unit within 12", which takes 6 hit.

spells.name: Shock Speed
spells.effect: Pick up to three friendly units within 12", which moves +2" when using Advance actions and +4" when using Rush/Charge actions once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: params.thisUnit ? this.getSpeed(unit, { advance: params.effect.advanceSpeed.value, rush: params.effect.rushSpeed.value }) : 0

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: params.thisUnit ? 0 : this.getSpeed(this.AverageUnit, { advance: params.effect.advanceSpeed.value, rush: params.effect.rushSpeed.value })

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Expel Threat
spells.effect: Pick one enemy model within 18", which takes 6 hit with AP(1).

specialRules.name: Fortified
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule take hits, those hits count as having AP(-1), to a min. of AP(0).

specialRules.name: Unique
specialRules.description: This unit may only be taken once per army.

specialRules.name: Armor
specialRules.description: Counts as having Defense X+.

specialRules.name: Repel Ambushers
specialRules.description: Enemy units using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model's unit.

specialRules.name: Coordinate
specialRules.description: At the end of this unit's activation, another friendly unit within 12" that hasn't activated yet may be activated immediately. May not be used if this unit was activated via Coordinate.

specialRules.name: Good Shot
specialRules.description: This model gets +1 to hit rolls when shooting.

specialRules.name: Shielded
specialRules.description: Units where all models have this rule get +1 to defense rolls against hits that are not from spells.

specialRules.name: Extended Buff Range
specialRules.description: If this unit is within 24" of another friendly unit with this rule that has a Hero in it, then that Hero may use special rules that allow it to pick friendly units within 12" (except for spells) on this unit as if it was in range.

specialRules.name: Mobile Artillery
specialRules.description: When this model uses a Hold action and shoots at enemies over 9" away, it gets +1 to hit rolls. As long this model hasn't moved during the round, when enemy units shoot at it from over 9" away, they get -2 to hit rolls.

specialRules.name: Hold the Line
specialRules.description: Units where all models have this rule get +1 to morale test rolls.

specialRules.name: Fracture
specialRules.description: Ignores Cover, and on unmodified results of 6 to hit, those hits get AP(+2).

specialRules.name: Regeneration Aura
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Regeneration.

specialRules.name: Entrenched Buff
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick one friendly unit within 12", which gets Entrenched once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: Precision Shooter Buff
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick one friendly unit within 12", which gets +1 to hit rolls when shooting once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: Rapid Advance Buff
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick one friendly unit within 12", which gets Rapid Advance once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: Morale Debuff
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick one enemy unit within 18", which gets -1 to morale test rolls once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: Hold the Line Boost Aura
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Hold the Line Boost.

specialRules.name: Relentless Mark
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick one enemy unit within 18", which friendly units gets Relentless against once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: Bane in Melee Buff
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick one friendly unit within 12", which gets Bane in melee once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: No Retreat Buff
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick one friendly unit within 12", which gets No Retreat once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Defense
specialRules.description: This model gets +X to defense rolls.

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9” away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush can’t seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Hero
specialRules.description: Heroes with up to Tough(6) may deploy as part of one multi-model unit without another Hero. The hero may take morale tests on behalf of the unit, but must use the unit’s Defense until all other models have been killed.

specialRules.name: Ignores Cover
specialRules.description: This weapon ignores cover.

specialRules.name: Regeneration
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule takes wounds, roll one die for each. On a 5+ it is ignored.

specialRules.name: Entrenched
specialRules.description: As long as a unit where all models have this rule hasn't moved during the round, enemy units shooting at it from over 9" away get -2 to hit rolls.

specialRules.name: Rapid Advance
specialRules.description: This model moves +4" when using Advance actions.

specialRules.name: Hold the Line Boost
specialRules.description: If all models in this unit have Hold the Line, they get +2 to morale test rolls from Hold the Line (instead of only +1).

specialRules.name: Relentless
specialRules.description: When this model shoots at enemies over 9" away, unmodified results of 6 to hit deal 1 extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Bane
specialRules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and when attacking the target must re-roll unmodified Defense results of 6.

specialRules.name: No Retreat
specialRules.description: When a unit where most models have this rule fails a morale test that causes it to be Shaken or Routed, the test counts as passed instead. Then, roll as many dice as the number of wounds it would take to fully destroy it, and for each result of 1-3 the unit takes one wound, which can't be ignored.
